q1: I really love the team Mexico
a1: I also like them they are very underrated
q2: Underrated? Are you kidding me? Everybody from my country wants to grow up to play for Argentina, Brazil or Mexico someday. Those are the best teams out there -- or can you think of a better team?
a2: In the Americas they are the top three. But they are still not in the same league as Brazil and Argentina.
q4: Who is the goalkeeper of Mexico?
q5: I thought it was Johny Depp?
a5: Francisco Guillermo Ochoa Magaña (Spanish pronunciation: [ɡiˈʝermo oˈtʃo.a]; born 13 July 1985), commonly referred to as Memo, is a Mexican professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Belgian club Standard Liège and the Mexico national team.
